name: A flowers premonition
description: I got bored and bought RPG maker.  This is probably bad because I literally threw it together in 2 weeks and for the most part only at school or like 3am.  There are 5 endings (good, bad, true, and some extra options behind good).  The story is only partially complete so feel free to make it up until I figure it out. Also I don't remember where ALL of the sounds I used came from but the music is from https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/rpg-music-pack-free-commercial-... and the sounds are mostly from somewhere on https://freesound.org/
